description: Enterprise techniques used by Silence, ATT&CK group G0091 v1.0
name: Silence (G0091)

techniques.comment: [Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has sent emails with malicious DOCX, CHM and ZIP attachments.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used scheduled tasks to stage its operation.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used JS, VBS, and PowerShell scripts.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used Winexe to install a service on the remote system.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used Windows command-line to run commands.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) attempts to get users to launch malicious attachments delivered via spearphishing emails.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has weaponized CHM files in their phishing campaigns.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) leverages the Windows API to perform a variety of tasks.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used environment variable string substitution for obfuscation.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) deleted scheduled task files after its execution.
[Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has been observed making videos of victims to observe bank employees day to day activities.
